a.n: Celtics/Cavaliers, 1992 NBA Eastern Conference Semifinals - Game 7

p.k: Game 7 in Cleveland belonged to the Cavs, 122-104, with Bird limited to 12 points in 33 minutes. Cleveland reached the conference finals for the first time since 1976 — and the last time until 2007 — while Bird added one last chapter to his career by winning Olympic gold with the Dream Team that summer, then announcing his retirement.
